Digital banking remains accessible for essential transactions.

title: The Berlin visa trap: Why Indian students are being asked to leave despite being enrolled
description: Hundreds of Indian students at a private Berlin university face deportation as their residence permits are not being renewed. Authorities deemed their hybrid study programmes, combining online and limited in-person classes, insufficient for a student visa under German law. This ruling leaves many mid-degree, facing significant financial losses and academic uncertainty.

Why Saudi Arabia and the UAE import sand from Australia despite their endless deserts
description: Despite vast deserts, Saudi Arabia and its Gulf neighbours rely on imported construction-grade sand to meet the demands of mega-projects like NEOM and the Burj Khalifa. Desert sand’s smooth grains are unsuitable for concrete, making riverbed and marine sand essential. This reliance highlights a global sand crisis, environmental pressures, and the urgent need for sustainable alternatives and innovation in construction materials.

title: Billionaire exodus: Two tech tycoons upset with Silicon Valley; may leave by tomorrow
description: Tech titans Peter Thiel and Larry Page are reportedly planning to leave California before year-end, fearing a proposed 5% wealth tax on billionaires. The measure, if passed and retroactive, could cost them billions. While some politicians dismiss these threats, others warn of an exodus of talent and investment from the Golden State.

title: Happy New Year 2026: Wishes, images, quotes, wallpapers, and more
description: As 2026 approaches, the article highlights the diverse ways people celebrate and express New Year's wishes. It emphasizes the value of simple, heartfelt messages, relatable quotes, and genuine status updates, alongside visual elements like images and wallpapers, to connect with loved ones during this transitional period.

title: Stephen Curry’s son Canon Curry stuns fans with elite dribbling skills
description: Stephen Curry's son, Canon, showcased remarkable dribbling skills during a Warriors game. The view captivated fans and the clip went viral. Comparisons to 'The Lion King's' Simba emerged, with many predicting a bright future for the young prodigy.  Canon, the youngest of Stephen and Ayesha Curry's four children, is already impressing with his talent.

title: Candace Owens flags new claims questioning Charlie Kirk death timeline
description: Candace Owens says Mitch Snow’s claims about Charlie Kirk’s death need verified timelines, not assumptions. Snow, a retired Army medic, says he was at Fort Huachuca and saw key figures. Online users question his memory and details. No official proof confirms his account. Owens asks for solid evidence to settle the debate.

title: Stefon Diggs scans stands for Cardi B after Patriots’ 42-10 win over Jets
description: New England Patriots star Stefon Diggs searched for his partner Cardi B after a decisive win against the New York Jets. This public display of affection garnered varied reactions online. Some praised the gesture as loving, while others questioned its authenticity. The couple had reportedly spent Christmas apart, making their reunion notable.

title: Chinese tycoon with over 100 children eyes 20 US-born kids for video game business
description: Chinese billionaire Xu Bo reportedly aims to father at least 20 US-born children to inherit his $1.1 billion gaming fortune, bypassing domestic birth restrictions. This mirrors a trend among ultra-wealthy men like Pavel Durov and Elon Musk, who are also expanding their biological legacies through modern means.
